__e: After he left the hospital, he stayed with us for a few nights, but...
Sometimes what's best for this hospital is what's best for the patients.
I did, but then I changed my mind and I called the hospital myself and, you know, I think...
Well... I can give you a letter that says the hospital couldn't possibly do without you.
Hey, so what I wasn't able to tell you the other night is that that lawsuit we've got with the hospital has nothing to do with you.
This is your memory of the day you called the hospital, not the actual day.
Make a pretty penny for the hospital, I'll be bound.
You told me that hospitals are the scariest places for you.
I'm just saying that a hospital is a safer place to have a kid.
- The hospital said I could find you here.
The hospital said he's fine, so he's fine.
He's not at his flat and the hospital just rung.
And she call hospital for your husband, okay?
You left the hospital in the middle of the day for almost three hours without telling anyone.
Saving this hospital wasn't about me. It was about helping people with nowhere else to go.
What do you mean, call the state hospital?
The local hospital is four hours away, and she has no transport.
Hey, so Ali's hospital is an hour away.
